attract.title: The Africa We Ought to Know

main.title: The Africa We Ought to Know
main.subheading: Select from any of the videos below to learn more about places and people in Africa.

videos.title: The Rise and Fall of Empires in Africa
videos.description: Watch how empires and artworks have shaped the African continent for thousands of years.

videos.title: Materials That Move: Networks of Trade in Africa
videos.description: Learn about the vast trade routes in Africa. Trade routes allowed for significant cultural exchanges from within and outside the continent.

videos.title: Ivory: Transnational Trade
videos.description: Ivory has been seen as a luxury good since ancient times in Africa. Learn about the history of ivory trading and the trafficking that still occurs.

videos.title: Gold, Conquest, and Human Trafficking
videos.description: Gold has been an important worldwide luxury good for millennia. Empires conquered others for access to gold ore regions. Learn about how gold influenced trade and human trafficking.
